},{"internalType":"uint256","name":"","type":"uint256"}],"name":"secondaryToPrimarySubsidy","outputs":[{"internalType":"uint256","name":"","type":"uint256"}],"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"inputs":[],"name":"secondaryWinningEntry","outputs":[{"internalType":"uint256","name":"","type":"uint256"}],"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"address","name":"operator","type":"address"},{"internalType":"bool","name":"approved","type":"bool"}],"name":"setApprovalForAll","outputs":[],"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"bytes32","name":"_root","type":"bytes32"}],"name":"setPrimaryMerkleRoot","outputs":[],"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"bytes32","name":"_root","type":"bytes32"}],"name":"setSecondaryMerkleRoot","outputs":[],"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"uint256[]","name":"winningEntries","type":"uint256[]"},{"internalType":"uint256[]","name":"payoutBps","type":"uint256[]"}],"name":"settleContest","outputs":[],"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"},{"inputs":[],"name":"state","outputs":[{"internalType":"enum Contest.ContestState","name":"","type":"uint8"}],"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"bytes4","name":"interfaceId","type":"bytes4"}],"name":"supportsInterface","outputs":[{"internalType":"bool","name":"","type":"bool"}],"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"inputs":[],"name":"targetPrimaryShareBps","outputs":[{"internalType":"uint256","name":"","type":"uint256"}],"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"inputs":[],"name":"totalPrimaryPositionSubsidies","outputs":[{"internalType":"uint256","name":"","type":"uint256"}],"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"uint256","name":"","type":"uint256"}],"name":"uri","outputs":[{"internalType":"string","name":"","type":"string"}],"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"}],"devdoc":{"author":"MagRelo","details":"Combined contest and prediction market contract Three-layer architecture: - Layer 0 (Oracle): Real-world event data provided by the oracle - Layer 1 (Primary): Competition participants with fixed deposits - Layer 2 (Secondary): Prediction market on primary outcomes using LMSR Layer 1 (Primary): - Primary participants deposit fixed amount to enter - Oracle distributes prizes based on results - Winners claim their payouts Layer 2 (Secondary): - Secondary participants predict on primary positions using LMSR pricing - Configurable entry fee split between prize pool and primary position bonuses - Winner-take-all redemption based on Layer 1 results - Dynamic cross-subsidy keeps primary and secondary prize pools near a configurable ratio - Can withdraw during OPEN phase only (full refund with deferred fees) Key Innovation: ONE oracle call (`settleContest()`) settles both layers!","errors":{"ERC1155InsufficientBalance(address,uint256,uint256,uint256)":[{"details":"Indicates an error related to the current `balance` of a `sender`. Used in transfers.","params":{"balance":"Current balance for the interacting account.","needed":"Minimum amount required to perform a transfer.","sender":"Address whose tokens are being transferred.","tokenId":"Identifier number of a token."}}],"ERC1155InvalidApprover(address)":[{"details":"Indicates a failure with the `approver` of a token to be approved. Used in approvals.","params":{"approver":"Address initiating an approval operation."}}],"ERC1155InvalidArrayLength(uint256,uint256)":[{"details":"Indicates an array length mismatch between ids and values in a safeBatchTransferFrom operation. Used in batch transfers.","params":{"idsLength":"Length of the array of token identifiers","valuesLength":"Length of the array of token amounts"}}],"ERC1155InvalidOperator(address)":[{"details":"Indicates a failure with the `operator` to be approved. Used in approvals.","params":{"operator":"Address that may be allowed to operate on tokens without being their owner."}}],"ERC1155InvalidReceiver(address)":[{"details":"Indicates a failure with the token `receiver`. Used in transfers.","params":{"receiver":"Address to which tokens are being transferred."}}],"ERC1155InvalidSender(address)":[{"details":"Indicates a failure with the token `sender`. Used in transfers.","params":{"sender":"Address whose tokens are being transferred."}}],"ERC1155MissingApprovalForAll(address,address)":[{"details":"Indicates a failure with the `operator`\u2019s approval. Used in transfers.","params":{"operator":"Address that may be allowed to operate on tokens without being their owner.","owner":"Address of the current owner of a token."}}],"ReentrancyGuardReentrantCall()":[{"details":"Unauthorized reentrant call."}],"SafeERC20FailedOperation(address)":[{"details":"An operation with an ERC-20 token failed."}]},"events":{"ApprovalForAll(address,address,bool)":{"details":"Emitted when `account` grants or revokes permission to `operator` to transfer their tokens, according to `approved`."},"TransferBatch(address,address,address,uint256[],uint256[])":{"details":"Equivalent to multiple {TransferSingle} events, where `operator`, `from` and `to` are the same for all transfers."},"TransferSingle(address,address,address,uint256,uint256)":{"details":"Emitted when `value` amount of tokens of type `id` are transferred from `from` to `to` by `operator`."},"URI(string,uint256)":{"details":"Emitted when the URI for token type `id` changes to `value`, if it is a non-programmatic URI. If an {URI} event was emitted for `id`, the standard https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-1155#metadata-extensions[guarantees] that `value` will equal the value returned by {IERC1155MetadataURI-uri}."}},"kind":"dev","methods":{"addPrimaryPosition(uint256,bytes32[])":{"details":"Must deposit exact primaryDepositAmount per entry","params":{"entryId":"Unique entry ID (from database/external system)","merkleProof":"Merkle proof for whitelist verification (empty array if no gating)"}},"addSecondaryPosition(uint256,uint256,bytes32[])":{"details":"Uses LMSR pricing - popular entries cost more","params":{"amount":"Amount of payment token to deposit","entryId":"Entry ID to add position on","merkleProof":"Merkle proof for whitelist verification (empty array if no gating)"}},"balanceOf(address,uint256)":{"details":"See {IERC1155-balanceOf}."},"balanceOfBatch(address[],uint256[])":{"details":"See {IERC1155-balanceOfBatch}. Requirements: - `accounts` and `ids` must have the same length."},"calculateSecondaryPrice(uint256)":{"params":{"entryId":"The entry to get price for"},"returns":{"_0":"Current price per token"}},"cancelContest()":{"details":"Cannot cancel after settlement - settlement is final"},"claimPrimaryPayout(uint256)":{"details":"Pays both prize payout AND primary position bonus in one transaction","params":{"entryId":"The entry to claim payout for"}},"claimSecondaryPayout(uint256)":{"params":{"entryId":"The entry to claim"}},"closeContest()":{"details":"Can only be called after expiryTimestampSweeps any remaining balance to oracle address"},"constructor":{"details":"Recommended: Use ContestFactory which calculates this as primaryDepositAmount \u00d7 100Lower values = steeper curves (stronger early incentive), higher values = flatter curves","params":{"_demandSensitivityBps":"LMSR price sensitivity parameter","_expiryTimestamp":"When contest expires (for refunds)","_liquidityParameter":"LMSR curve parameter - controls price curve steepness","_oracle":"Address that controls contest lifecycle","_oracleFeeBps":"Oracle fee as basis points","_paymentToken":"ERC20 token used for deposits and payouts","_primaryDepositAmount":"Fixed amount each primary participant must deposit","_primaryPositionShareBps":"Portion of secondary deposit going to primary position bonuses (e.g., 750 = 7.5%)","_primaryShareBps":"Portion of secondary deposit going to prize pool (e.g., 750 = 7.5%)"}},"isApprovedForAll(address,address)":{"details":"See {IERC1155-isApprovedForAll}."},"lockContest()":{"details":"Prevents last-second positions when outcome is nearly certain Use case: Lock contest when final round starts, before results are known This prevents unfair late positions and potential race conditions"},"pushPrimaryPayouts(uint256[])":{"details":"Oracle can use this to help users who forgot to claimGas-efficient: oracle controls which entries to push","params":{"entryIds":"Array of entry IDs to push payouts for"}},"pushSecondaryPayouts(address[],uint256)":{"details":"Oracle can use this to help secondary participants who forgot to claimGas-efficient: oracle controls which participants to push","params":{"entryId":"The winning entry ID (should be secondaryWinningEntry)","participantAddresses":"Array of secondary participant addresses to push payouts for"}},"removePrimaryPosition(uint256)":{"details":"Works in OPEN state (before contest starts) or CANCELLED state (full refund)Secondary participant funds on this entry remain in prize pool (no refunds)","params":{"entryId":"Entry to withdraw"}},"removeSecondaryPosition(uint256,uint256)":{"details":"Works in: - OPEN state (during registration, before competition starts) - CANCELLED state (full refund anytime)NOT allowed in ACTIVE state - once competition starts, positions are locked","params":{"entryId":"Which entry to withdraw from","tokenAmount":"Amount of tokens to burn"}},"safeBatchTransferFrom(address,address,uint256[],uint256[],bytes)":{"details":"See {IERC1155-safeBatchTransferFrom}."},"safeTransferFrom(address,address,uint256,uint256,bytes)":{"details":"See {IERC1155-safeTransferFrom}."},"setApprovalForAll(address,bool)":{"details":"See {IERC1155-setApprovalForAll}."},"setPrimaryMerkleRoot(bytes32)":{"params":{"_root":"Merkle root hash (bytes32(0) to disable gating)"}},"setSecondaryMerkleRoot(bytes32)":{"params":{"_root":"Merkle root hash (bytes32(0) to disable gating)"}},"settleContest(uint256[],uint256[])":{"details":"First entry in winningEntries is the overall winner (for secondary market)Entries not included are assumed to have 0% payoutAll payouts stored for later claims - NO transfers in this function","params":{"payoutBps":"Array of payout basis points (must sum to 10000)","winningEntries":"Array of winning entry IDs (only entries with payouts > 0)"}},"supportsInterface(bytes4)":{"details":"See {IERC165-supportsInterface}."},"uri(uint256)":{"details":"See {IERC1155MetadataURI-uri}. This implementation returns the same URI for *all* token types. It relies on the token type ID substitution mechanism https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-1155#metadata[defined in the ERC]. Clients calling this function must replace the `\\{id\\}` substring with the actual token type ID."}},"title":"Contest","version":1},"userdoc":{"kind":"user","methods":{"BPS_DENOMINATOR()":{"notice":"Denominator for basis point calculations"},"PRICE_PRECISION()":{"notice":"Price precision for LMSR calculations"},"accumulatedOracleFee()":{"notice":"Accumulated oracle fee from settlement (claimable by oracle)"},"activateContest()":{"notice":"Oracle activates contest (closes entry registration, secondary positions continue)"},"addPrimaryPosition(uint256,bytes32[])":{"notice":"User adds a primary position with a specific entry ID"},"addSecondaryPosition(uint256,uint256,bytes32[])":{"notice":"Secondary participant adds a position on a specific entry"},"calculateSecondaryPrice(uint256)":{"notice":"Calculate current LMSR price for an entry"},"cancelContest()":{"notice":"Oracle cancels contest, enables refunds"},"cancelExpired()":{"notice":"Anyone can cancel if expired and not settled"},"claimOracleFee()":{"notice":"Oracle claims accumulated fee from settlement"},"claimPrimaryPayout(uint256)":{"notice":"User claims payout for a specific entry after settlement"},"claimSecondaryPayout(uint256)":{"notice":"Secondary participant claims their payout (winner-take-all)"},"closeContest()":{"notice":"Close contest and sweep remaining unclaimed funds to treasury after expiry"},"constructor":{"notice":"Constructor initializes the contest"},"demandSensitivityBps()":{"notice":"Demand sensitivity in basis points - controls LMSR price curve steepness"},"entries(uint256)":{"notice":"Array of entry IDs (for iteration only)"},"entryOwner(uint256)":{"notice":"Maps entry ID to owner address (address(0) = withdrawn)"},"expiryTimestamp()":{"notice":"Timestamp when contest expires (for refunds)"},"liquidityParameter()":{"notice":"LMSR liquidity parameter - controls price curve steepness"},"lockContest()":{"notice":"Oracle locks contest (closes secondary positions before contest ends)"},"maxCrossSubsidyBps()":{"notice":"Maximum portion (in basis points) of any single deposit that can be reallocated to the opposite pool"},"netPosition(uint256)":{"notice":"Track net position for each entry ID (for LMSR pricing and total supply)"},"oracle()":{"notice":"Address of the oracle that controls contest state"},"oracleFeeBps()":{"notice":"Oracle fee in basis points (e.g., 100 = 1%)"},"paymentToken()":{"notice":"The payment token used for deposits and payouts"},"primaryDepositAmount()":{"notice":"Fixed deposit amount for primary participants"},"primaryMerkleRoot()":{"notice":"Merkle root for primary position whitelist (bytes32(0) = no gating)"},"primaryPositionShareBps()":{"notice":"Portion of secondary deposit that goes to primary position bonuses in basis points (e.g., 750 = 7.5%)"},"primaryPositionSubsidy(uint256)":{"notice":"Primary position subsidies per entry from secondary volume (7.5% of secondary deposits)"},"primaryPrizePool()":{"notice":"Primary prize pool - sum of all primary participant entry deposits"},"primaryPrizePoolPayouts(uint256)":{"notice":"Prize pool payouts for each entry after settlement"},"primaryPrizePoolSubsidy()":{"notice":"Primary prize pool subsidy from secondary participants (7.5% of secondary deposits)"},"primaryShareBps()":{"notice":"Portion of secondary deposit that goes to prize pool in basis points (e.g., 750 = 7.5%)"},"primaryToSecondarySubsidy(uint256)":{"notice":"Track cross-subsidy amount from primary deposits that was redirected to the secondary pool per entry"},"pushPrimaryPayouts(uint256[])":{"notice":"Push primary payouts (prize + bonus) to specific entries"},"pushSecondaryPayouts(address[],uint256)":{"notice":"Push secondary payouts to specific addresses"},"removePrimaryPosition(uint256)":{"notice":"User removes a primary position and gets deposit back"},"removeSecondaryPosition(uint256,uint256)":{"notice":"Secondary participant removes their position (burns tokens, gets 100% refund)"},"secondaryDepositedPerEntry(address,uint256)":{"notice":"Track deposits per secondary participant per entry (for withdrawal refunds)"},"secondaryMarketResolved()":{"notice":"Flag indicating if secondary market has been resolved"},"secondaryMerkleRoot()":{"notice":"Merkle root for secondary position whitelist (bytes32(0) = no gating)"},"secondaryPrizePool()":{"notice":"Secondary prize pool - collateral backing secondary position tokens (~85% of deposits)"},"secondaryToPrimarySubsidy(address,uint256)":{"notice":"Track cross-subsidy amounts from secondary deposits that were redirected to the primary pool per participant/entry"},"secondaryWinningEntry()":{"notice":"Winning entry ID after settlement (for winner-take-all)"},"setPrimaryMerkleRoot(bytes32)":{"notice":"Oracle sets merkle root for primary position whitelist"},"setSecondaryMerkleRoot(bytes32)":{"notice":"Oracle sets merkle root for addPrimaryPosition(uint256,bytes32[]).details: Must deposit exact primaryDepositAmount per entry

params.merkleProof: Merkle proof for whitelist verification (empty array if no gating)

addSecondaryPosition(uint256,uint256,byt.details: Uses LMSR pricing - popular entries cost more

params.amount: Amount of payment token to deposit
params.entryId: Entry ID to add position on
params.merkleProof: Merkle proof for whitelist verification (empty array if no gating)

balanceOfBatch(address[],uint256[]).details: See {IERC1155-balanceOfBatch}. Requirements: - `accounts` and `ids` must have the same length.

params.entryId: The entry to get price for

cancelContest().details: Cannot cancel after settlement - settlement is final

claimPrimaryPayout(uint256).details: Pays both prize payout AND primary position bonus in one transaction

params.entryId: The entry to claim payout for

closeContest().details: Can only be called after expiryTimestampSweeps any remaining balance to oracle address

constructor.details: Recommended: Use ContestFactory which calculates this as primaryDepositAmount  100Lower values = steeper curves (stronger early incentive), higher values = flatter curves

params._liquidityParameter: LMSR curve parameter - controls price curve steepness
params._paymentToken: ERC20 token used for deposits and payouts
params._primaryDepositAmount: Fixed amount each primary participant must deposit
params._primaryPositionShareBps: Portion of secondary deposit going to primary position bonuses (e.g., 750 = 7.5%)
params._primaryShareBps: Portion of secondary deposit going to prize pool (e.g., 750 = 7.5%)

lockContest().details: Prevents last-second positions when outcome is nearly certain Use case: Lock contest when final round starts, before results are known This prevents unfair late positions and potential race conditions

pushPrimaryPayouts(uint256[]).details: Oracle can use this to help users who forgot to claimGas-efficient: oracle controls which entries to push

params.entryIds: Array of entry IDs to push payouts for

pushSecondaryPayouts(address[],uint256).details: Oracle can use this to help secondary participants who forgot to claimGas-efficient: oracle controls which participants to push

params.entryId: The winning entry ID (should be secondaryWinningEntry)
params.participantAddresses: Array of secondary participant addresses to push payouts for

removePrimaryPosition(uint256).details: Works in OPEN state (before contest starts) or CANCELLED state (full refund)Secondary participant funds on this entry remain in prize pool (no refunds)

removeSecondaryPosition(uint256,uint256).details: Works in: - OPEN state (during registration, before competition starts) - CANCELLED state (full refund anytime)NOT allowed in ACTIVE state - once competition starts, positions are locked

params._root: Merkle root hash (bytes32(0) to disable gating)
Merkle root hash (bytes32(0) to disable gating)

settleContest(uint256[],uint256[]).details: First entry in winningEntries is the overall winner (for secondary market)Entries not included are assumed to have 0% payoutAll payouts stored for later claims - NO transfers in this function

params.payoutBps: Array of payout basis points (must sum to 10000)
params.winningEntries: Array of winning entry IDs (only entries with payouts > 0)

uri(uint256).details: See {IERC1155MetadataURI-uri}. This implementation returns the same URI for *all* token types. It relies on the token type ID substitution mechanism https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-1155#metadata[defined in the ERC]. Clients calling this function must replace the `\{id\}` substring with the actual token type ID.

accumulatedOracleFee().notice: Accumulated oracle fee from settlement (claimable by oracle)

activateContest().notice: Oracle activates contest (closes entry registration, secondary positions continue)

addPrimaryPosition(uint256,bytes32[]).notice: User adds a primary position with a specific entry ID

addSecondaryPosition(uint256,uint256,byt.notice: Secondary participant adds a position on a specific entry

calculateSecondaryPrice(uint256).notice: Calculate current LMSR price for an entry

cancelExpired().notice: Anyone can cancel if expired and not settled

claimOracleFee().notice: Oracle claims accumulated fee from settlement

claimPrimaryPayout(uint256).notice: User claims payout for a specific entry after settlement

closeContest().notice: Close contest and sweep remaining unclaimed funds to treasury after expiry

demandSensitivityBps().notice: Demand sensitivity in basis points - controls LMSR price curve steepness

entries(uint256).notice: Array of entry IDs (for iteration only)

entryOwner(uint256).notice: Maps entry ID to owner address (address(0) = withdrawn)

liquidityParameter().notice: LMSR liquidity parameter - controls price curve steepness

lockContest().notice: Oracle locks contest (closes secondary positions before contest ends)

maxCrossSubsidyBps().notice: Maximum portion (in basis points) of any single deposit that can be reallocated to the opposite pool

netPosition(uint256).notice: Track net position for each entry ID (for LMSR pricing and total supply)

oracle().notice: Address of the oracle that controls contest state

paymentToken().notice: The payment token used for deposits and payouts

primaryDepositAmount().notice: Fixed deposit amount for primary participants

primaryMerkleRoot().notice: Merkle root for primary position whitelist (bytes32(0) = no gating)

primaryPositionShareBps().notice: Portion of secondary deposit that goes to primary position bonuses in basis points (e.g., 750 = 7.5%)

primaryPositionSubsidy(uint256).notice: Primary position subsidies per entry from secondary volume (7.5% of secondary deposits)

primaryPrizePool().notice: Primary prize pool - sum of all primary participant entry deposits

primaryPrizePoolPayouts(uint256).notice: Prize pool payouts for each entry after settlement

primaryPrizePoolSubsidy().notice: Primary prize pool subsidy from secondary participants (7.5% of secondary deposits)

primaryShareBps().notice: Portion of secondary deposit that goes to prize pool in basis points (e.g., 750 = 7.5%)

primaryToSecondarySubsidy(uint256).notice: Track cross-subsidy amount from primary deposits that was redirected to the secondary pool per entry

pushPrimaryPayouts(uint256[]).notice: Push primary payouts (prize + bonus) to specific entries

pushSecondaryPayouts(address[],uint256).notice: Push secondary payouts to specific addresses

removePrimaryPosition(uint256).notice: User removes a primary position and gets deposit back

removeSecondaryPosition(uint256,uint256).notice: Secondary participant removes their position (burns tokens, gets 100% refund)

secondaryDepositedPerEntry(address,uint2.notice: Track deposits per secondary participant per entry (for withdrawal refunds)

secondaryMarketResolved().notice: Flag indicating if secondary market has been resolved

secondaryMerkleRoot().notice: Merkle root for secondary position whitelist (bytes32(0) = no gating)

secondaryPrizePool().notice: Secondary prize pool - collateral backing secondary position tokens (~85% of deposits)

secondaryToPrimarySubsidy(address,uint25.notice: Track cross-subsidy amounts from secondary deposits that were redirected to the primary pool per participant/entry

secondaryWinningEntry().notice: Winning entry ID after settlement (for winner-take-all)

setPrimaryMerkleRoot(bytes32).notice: Oracle sets merkle root for primary position whitelist

setSecondaryMerkleRoot(bytes32).notice: Oracle sets merkle root for secondary position whitelist

settleContest(uint256[],uint256[]).notice: Oracle settles contest - pure accounting (no transfers)

targetPrimaryShareBps().notice: Target primary-side share (in basis points) used to balance cross-subsidies between pools

totalPrimaryPositionSubsidies().notice: Aggregate of all outstanding primary position subsidies (sum of primaryPositionSubsidy values)
